fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you receive three targets. At least 2 of these targets will be Town, and the third can be from any faction. If a target dies, their place is taken by their killer, or if not applicable, a random player.
- When all of your targets visit you on the same night, they are eaten alive by the Great Many-Mouthed One.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Have all of your targets visit you on the same night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
